creds.title: PlayStation 4
creds.description: Credentials needed. Press 'Submit' and then in the PS4 2nd Screen App, refresh devices and select the 'Home-Assistant' device to continue.

mode.title: PlayStation 4
mode.description: Select mode for configuration. The IP Address field can be left blank if selecting Auto Discovery, as devices will be automatically discovered.

data.ip_address: IP Address (Leave empty if using Auto Discovery).

link.title: PlayStation 4
link.description: Enter your PlayStation 4 information. For 'PIN', navigate to 'Settings' on your PlayStation 4 console. Then navigate to 'Mobile App Connection Settings' and select 'Add Device'. Enter the PIN that is displayed. Refer to the [documentation](https://www.home-assistant.io/components/ps4/) for additional info.

error.credential_timeout: Credential service timed out. Press submit to restart.
error.not_ready: PlayStation 4 is not on or connected to network.
error.login_failed: Failed to pair to PlayStation 4. Verify PIN is correct.
error.no_ipaddress: Enter the IP Address of the PlayStation 4 you would like to configure.

abort.no_devices_found: No PlayStation 4 devices found on the network.
abort.devices_configured: All devices found are already configured.
abort.port_987_bind_error: Could not bind to port 987. Refer to the [documentation](https://www.home-assistant.io/components/ps4/) for additional info.
abort.port_997_bind_error: Could not bind to port 997. Refer to the [documentation](https://www.home-assistant.io/components/ps4/) for additional info.
